title: Smokebreaker: A 90 day guide to free you from cigarettes forever
description: Hi, I'm Russell Crow... What! Yeah, I get that all the time. I'm better known as GC. that stands for... Guardian Crow, I appear in my alter ego's new book, called, "Smokebreaker(TM)".I guide readers through a 90 day journey that will end their dependence on cigarettes...For Good!My team, Bulldog Drummin', (he's the re-inforcer), Fernando Llama, (he's the cheerleader and is there to rally readers), yup, he's known as the Rally Llama and finally, Toni Robin, our chief Motivator, (she's really good at that) are all on board to ensure that our readers will be successful in one of the most difficult challenges they'll ever face..to finally quit that awful habit - smoking.If you're a smoker and really want to quit, join us in a journey of the most productive 90 days of your life.
author: P.F. Barry
